title: The Writer's Almanac for Tuesday, December 7, 2021
description: Willa Cather was born on this day, 1913. On writing, she said, “If I made a chore of it, my enthusiasm would die…I make it an adventure every day.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Willa Cather was born on this day, 1913. On writing, she said, “If I made a chore of it, my enthusiasm would die…I make it an adventure every day.”
